definition: to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

to divide/to separate/to distribute/to allocate/to distinguish (good and bad)/part or subdivision/fraction/one tenth (of certain units)/unit of length equivalent to 0.33 cm/minute (unit of time)/minute (angular measurement unit)/a point (in sports or games)/0.01 yuan (unit of money)

sentences.english: And Lin Bicheng exorbitant is conceited, meet with repeatedly setback.
sentences.chinese: 而林必成過分的自負，屢遭挫折。

sentences.english: Many natural resources are being overdeveloped.
sentences.chinese: 許多自然資源被過分開發。

sentences.english: We need to have a happy medium between being too close and too distant to our friends.
sentences.chinese: 對待朋友應在過分親近與過分疏遠中，選擇中庸之道。

sentences.english: We need to have a happy medium between being too close and too distant to our friends.
sentences.chinese: 對待朋友應在過分親近與過分疏遠中，選擇中庸之道。

sentences.english: We must keep away excessive lavish and .
sentences.chinese: 我們必須避免過分放縱和鋪張浪費。

sentences.english: Yet, it would be too much to expect a friend to do every-thing for you.
sentences.chinese: 不過，要求朋友爲你做一切事，那是太過分了。

sentences.english: Don't trust to your own memory too much.
sentences.chinese: 不要過分相信自己的記憶力。

sentences.english: Idling for long periods in cold weather can actually cause excessive engine wear.
sentences.chinese: 冷天時的長時間怠速會造成發動機過分磨損。

sentences.english: Why should the world be over-wise.
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼世界還會有這過分的聰明。

sentences.english: Towards the end, it's Grenade spamming gone overboard.
sentences.chinese: 臨近結束時，它的榴彈的垃圾郵件了過分。

sentences.english: We cannot overemphasize that this is a skill developed through practice.
sentences.chinese: 我們不能過分強調這是一項通過實踐獲得的技能。

sentences.english: Sure, it's a mistake to romanticize all this any more than is strictly necessary.
sentences.chinese: 當然，沒有必要地把這一切過分浪漫化。

sentences.english: I liked Jerry, but he took every conversation awfully seriously.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡傑裏，但是他把每一次談話都看得過分認真了。

sentences.english: But too much dreaming sinks and drowns.
sentences.chinese: 但過分的夢想能使人滅頂下沉。

sentences.english: However, many mooncake buyers expressed their dismay at the overly-elaborated boxes.
sentences.chinese: 然而許多月餅買家對過分精美的盒子表示了不滿。

sentences.english: These valves will also sustain damage when excessively torqued.
sentences.chinese: 當過分扭轉時，這些閥門還是會受到損傷。

definition: to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
